name: Mike Tyson Boxing
overview: Take on Tyson or be Tyson. Fight one-off bouts, compete in tournaments or become a career boxer and slug it out for the World Title Belt. Showcase takes place in 16 international locations, where the player faces each of the boxers in a world tournament league, winning a match against one unlocks another opponent to face. Versus mode allows you to play head-to-head against human or computer opponents. World Game features 90 boxers and is career-based, the long-term objective being to manage a chosen boxer through a successful career. A practice option is also included set in Tyson's personal training gym where you must learn various boxing skills, including defense, movement, punches and dodging and blocking.
